original_title: Special security program for prisons in line with Christmas; Visits to Matara prison suspended
original_body_lines: In preparation for Christmas, the Department of Prisons has enacted a special security program for today and tomorrow, effective across all prisons island, Prison Commissioner and Spokesperson Gamini B. Dissanayake said.
Following strict adherence to prison regulations and health safety protocols, the program allows each inmate to receive three visitors, comprising relatives or friends.
However, due to a recent fever outbreak among inmates, visits to Matara Prison have been temporarily suspended this Christmas.
